original_text: Yet ye say, Wherefore? Because the Lord hath been witness between thee and the wife of thy youth, against whom thou hast dealt treacherously: yet is she thy companion, and the wife of thy covenant.
korean_text: 너희는 이르기를 어찌 됨이니이까 하는도다 이는 너와 네가 어려서 맞이한 아내 사이에 여호와께서 증인이 되시기 때문이라 그는 네 짝이요 너와 서약한 아내로되 네가 그에게 거짓을 행하였도다

sentences.original_text: Because the Lord hath been witness
between thee and the wife of thy youth
against whom thou hast dealt treacherously
sentences.korean_translation: 너가 그를 대하여 신실치 않았기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: and the wife of thy covenant
